        nop
start:  ldi r0, ff
loop:   cpi r0, 0
        jz foo
        adi r0, ff
        jmp loop

foo:    in r1, 0
        xoi r1, 1
        ani r1, 1
        out r1, 0
        jmp start


0000000000000000 nop
0000111111110001 ldi, r0 ff
0000000000001101 cpi r0, 0
1010000010110000 jz
0000000000001000 foo
0000111111111001 adi r0, ff
0000000010110000 jmp
0000000000000010 loop
0001000000000010 in r1, 0
0001000000010111 xor r1, 1
0001000000010011 ani r1, 1
0001000000000100 out r1, 0
0000000010110000
0000000000000001 start

0000000000000000

0000000000001101

0000000000001000
